Description:
Vibrant Lifestyle
Perfectly positioned directly across from what will be a state-of-the-art park & playground! This home is all about life-style living, enjoying time with family & friends and not being burdened with arduous chores that present themselves with large block sizes. This is all about enjoying your life for today! Located in the ever-popular heart of Officer this innovative home is ready for you to simply move straight in and do absolutely nothing but enjoy! Expansive living and dining areas with a state of the art gourmet kitchen boasting Smeg appliances and white stone bench tops. The home is inundated with natural light. Featuring a grand sized master bedroom with stylish ensuite and large WIR and two further bedrooms, this is 5 Star living! With absolutely minimal garden maintenance required, more time can be enjoyed on recreational activities. Extra’s include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double car remote garage and more! Just moments from all amenities, Arcadia Estate is within close proximity to shopping centres, parks, Cardinia Train Station, public & private schools, along with easy access to the freeway - all adding to the recreational and family lifestyle benefits available here. Do not miss this opportunity to secure this home in an outstanding location!
Insights: 25 Harmony Place, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2017 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Offers Closing Tuesday 31st Octoberr at 6:00pm sharp!
Enjoy the lifestyle offered in the brand-new Aspect Estate, Officer. With an array of local shops, parks, schools & public transport, everything your family needs is right at your doorstep.
Providing effortless comfort in a well-regarded street and quiet, convenient location. This home offers so much for a family, first home buyer, downsizer or astute investor with the easy floorplan.
Featuring 3 bedrooms master with en-suite and walk in robe, other 2 bedrooms with built in robes. Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and beautiful window splashback, perfect if you're the chef of the Family. Creature comforts included gas ducted heating, A/C split system cooling, remote single garage with internal access. Outdoors the 331m2 approx. flat block provides relaxation with alfresco area.
Minutes to the freeway and train station, don't miss this appealing Officer home.

Perfectly positioned in popular Arena estate this as new home is sure to impress the most fastidious of buyers.
* Featuring a beautiful central open plan large living and dining area

Only a short walk to Arena Shopping Centre, close proximity to Princes Hwy, M1 Freeway, Sporting Grounds and Lakeside Lake & Parkland

Description:
YOU'LL BE HOOKED ON CRANBROOK!
This beautifully presented home, portrays a modern façade and cleverly designed floor plan; this home has it all!
Located in the sought-after Arcadia Estate in Officer, its fantastic location and accessibility to all amenities will not disappoint.
This sophisticated home comprises of a spacious and elegant kitchen fitted with overhead cupboards, stainless steel dishwasher, 900mm stainless steel appliances and ample bench space overlooking the open plan meals and living area.
The contemporary master bedroom consists of a private ensuite and a walk in robe; the other three bedrooms fitted with built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom.
Complimenting this seamless floorplan and beautiful home is an ability to create the undercover area, perfect for those who love to entertain or simply enjoy the outdoors on a nice summer night. Ducted heating, a split system and double remote-control garage with internal and external access, makes for an easy decision to settle on 5 Cranbrook Circuit!
When location is everything, look no further! Located close to schools, shops, freeways, transport and much more! What more could you want?

Description:
Charming Family Home
Delightful, beautiful and full of charm - discover this gorgeous 3BR property in the keenly sought Arena Estate, easy to schools, shops, sporting and medical facilities.
Upon entering this light filled home you will notice the quality floor boards that run throughout, an open plan kitchen with an exquisite butler's pantry, breakfast bar, quality appliances including dishwasher and 900mm stove.
The kitchen overlooks an ample sized open plan living area to the rear, out to outstanding backyard space with timber decked pergola and landscaped gardens. Space for year round entertaining.
Sizeable master with ensuite and WIR, and a second bedroom, are conveniently located on the ground level, whilst the third bedroom with a private retreat is up on the first floor.
The flexibility of this upstairs living area is complimented by a powder room with toilet, allowing ease of use as a guest's bedroom, or home business of some description (currently used as a home beauty business).
Other features include but are not limited to, ducted heating, split system air conditioning, double garage with rear access and quality window furnishings.
Be sure not to miss out on this opportunity as it will not last long...

Description:
Nest or Invest in the Arcadia Estate!
Opportunity awaits the lucky buyer of this freshly built four bedroom home in the sought after Arcadia Estate! Set close to all amenities such as schools, shops, Club Officer, medical facilities and only a short distance to Cardinia Road train station, this home has all you could ask for.
Upon entry you are welcomed with a spacious master bedroom, ensuite with walk in robe with the three remaining great sized bedrooms featuring built-in-robes and their own private hallway connecting to the main bathroom and separate toilet. a large open plan family meals area perfect for entertaining all year round.
The modern kitchen features stainless steel appliances, gas cooktops with and dishwasher. The home also has some great features included such as ducted heating, split system air-conditioner, quality roller blinds throughout with a low maintenance gardens with no work to be done!
This is a brand new home not to be missed, call today to organize an inspection!

Description:
The Best of Everything!
Make this yours and be impressed with the 4 bedroom, 2 bathrooms plus home office / study. Only 2 years young and 33 squares of living you will love to call this property HOME. Step through the front door and be greeted with size, space and 2.7 meter high ceilings with wide entry. Master suite is large with FES and walk in robe. The home office / study is positioned off from the main bedroom with its own external door which is convenient for a business where you can work from home. The open plan living is perfect for you and your family as well as entertaining friends. Butlers pantry, waterfall Caesar stone benchtops and top of the range stainless steel appliances are all on offer. Vast space encourages you to spread out relax and enjoy living in this quality built home. Double sided gas fire place is a treat with these cold evenings and this overlooks the family room and formal dining room. Beautiful bamboo flooring throughout the home and fully tiled main bathroom and en-suite. The large slide door takes you out to the alfresco area, perfect for the hot summer days and nights to come. The double remote garage offers a double brick wall and the ceiling height is 2.9 meters. All inclusions are listed with photos.

Description:
EX –DISPLAY IS READY TO MOVE IN
Be amazed by this wonderful family home which welcomes you with its touch of style, character, and class and is ideal for the astute purchaser who loves to entertain the masses.
Nestled in an elite location on a whisper quiet street within walking distance to a beautiful local park, schools, shops, bus stop and spread out on a fantastic allotment, this sensational Ex-Display home will no doubt be the envy of all family and friends forever!
Cleverly zoned, the superior floor plan focusses on large scale gatherings with its warm and inviting blend of formal and informal living spaces. Comprising 4 large bedrooms, master suite with huge WIR and ensuite, fully equipped kitchen with an abundance of cupboard and bench space, walking in-pantry, adjoining a spacious open plan family and meals area and a rumpus room.
Step outside, fire up the BBQ on your beautiful alfresco and be amazed by the generous proportions that the manicured and professionally landscaped yard provides which effortlessly meets up with the home to provide the ultimate indoor/outdoor integration.
Extras include grand entry, high ceilings/doors, timber floors, double remote garage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, quality s/s appliances, stone bench tops, alfresco, plantation shutters and much more!
Homes like this do not come up often, so call now and be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.

Description:
All About Lifestyle Living!
Just moments from Arena and Beaconsfield Shopping Centre, Berwick Grammar, Heritage College and close to bike and walking tracks, public transport options, plus easy access to the freeway - all adding to the recreational and family lifestyle benefits available here. This home is all about life-style living, enjoying time with family & friends and not being burdened with arduous chores that present themselves with large block sizes. This is all about enjoying your life for today! With a magnificent backdrop of trees in the distance, located on the ever-popular north side of the high-way this innovative and quality home is ready for you to simply move straight in and do absolutely nothing but enjoy! Expansive living and dining areas with a state of the art gourmet kitchen boasting Smeg appliances and white stone bench tops all opening to the alfresco space. The home is inundated with natural light. Featuring a grand sized master bedroom with stylish ensuite and large WIR and three further bedrooms this is 5 Star living! With absolutely minimal garden maintenance required more time can be enjoyed on recreational activities. Extra’s include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, double car remote garage and more! Do not miss this opportunity to secure this home in an outstanding location!

Description:
ALL THE ROOM YOU NEED IN POTTERS GROVE!
Looking for the low maintenance lifestyle without compromising on living space? Look no further as this impressive Officer abode is looking for new owners!
A well-appointed residence it features a separate dining area, rumpus room plus a study. With an open plan family living/meals area that is adjoined by a spacious galley style kitchen, with stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances and ample storage throughout.
The accommodation on offer is four generous sized bedrooms, master suite contains an oversized walk-in robe and luxurious ensuite with a double vanity.
The remaining three bedrooms all have built in robes and are serviced by the family bathroom.
Additional highlights; undercover alfresco, ducted vacuum, ducted heating, situated on a low maintenance 448m2 allotment. Located within close proximity to parkland, Officer town centre and a minutes' drive to the Beaconsfield shopping precinct.
Don't miss out on this most perfect opportunity!

Description:
An opportunity to own one of Grandvue Estates finest homes
There are houses, and there are HOMES! You don't want to miss the opportunity to take a look at one of Grandvue Estates finest!
This lovely 4 year old Porter Davis dream is simply perfect. Within walking distance of St Francis Xavier College, St Clares Primary School, Arena Shopping Centre and a five minute drive to Cardinia Train Station and the Monash Freeway.
A spacious and welcoming hallway greets you as you walk through the front door. Beautiful polished timber floors give class to the spacious open living and dining area. There is a well appointed kitchen with stainless steel dishwasher, 900mm wide free standing industrial oven and gas stove, plus a walk in pantry for the chef in the family.
A large alfresco area overlooks a spacious rear garden.
The master suite of this stunning home includes a WIR with en-suite, while the remaining three bedrooms include built in robes, spacious enough for double bed furniture.
The laundry has direct external access and the double garage has direct internal access and the ducted heating/evaporative cooling will keep you comfortable no matter the season.
This is the perfect forever family home so don't dawdle, it won't last long on today's market.
open for inspection Thursday 6 to 6.30 pm
Open for inspection Saturday 11.30 to 12.00 and Auction to start at 12 noon Please call for express entry

Description:
Renovated Unit In Desirable Location!
Enjoying a private and peaceful rear position on a block of just 4 quality units, this modern, spacious brick residence is a brilliant package of quality and practicality sitting on a 272m2 block.
The attraction starts with first home buyers, and streams through to Investors and downsizers who want the central location that's accessible to public transport, shops, schools and easy access to the Highway.
Inside showcases all the characteristics for an easy lifestyle, with two sizable robed bedrooms, master bedroom equipped with semi ensuite, a great sized living room and meals area accompanied by a spacious modern kitchen featuring stainless steel cooking appliances, dishwasher and ample cupboard space.
Complementing this package deal is x2 split system heating/cooling units, ceiling fans, single garage and carport, generous sized pergola as well as the immaculately presented courtyard and last but not least gate access to the vacant land!
Be sure to inspect this hidden gem, you wont be disappointed!

Description:
Perfect Family Home or Investment
Fantastic opportunity to secure this spacious and well built home close to shopping, transport and schools in popular Officer. A unique 3-bedroom floor plan offers a refreshingly sensible design, where rooms flow naturally with the rhythm of family life. Flanked by 2 living areas, main bed room with walk in robe and ensuite, spacious living with open plan kitchen/meals, family bathroom with bath, and double garage with internal access to the home. The modern kitchen is well appointed with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, both bathrooms include a classy contemporary look; and the property includes ducted heating and split system cooling. The undercover alfresco living soaks up winter sunshine aspect.
Outside is fully landscaped with a private rear courtyard for low maintenance living.

Description:
TRUE ATTENTION-GETTER, WITH COURTYARD APPEAL - OFFICER
This home is situated in the much desired neighbourhood of Arena and is modern, fresh and spotlessly built by AV Jennings just 2 years ago. It boasts 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, an ensuite to the master bedroom and a dedicated study area is an added bonus.
A centrally located open plan kitchen/meals/lounge area is the hub of the home. The kitchen has great bench space, plenty of storage and stylish stainless-steel appliances that make cooking a joy. This then flows outdoors to a private courtyard, perfect for relaxing or entertaining friends.
Features include super-efficient Nobo electric panel heating throughout, split system cooling, floor tiles, recycled water, contemporary colour scheme and a double remote garage with internal access.
This amazing opportunity in Officer is superbly located close to shops, public transport and opposite the Heatherbrae Reserve, making it ideal for those with pets or kids needing exercise.
View the home immediately to avoid disappointment.

Description:
"Is this property yours “to be or not to be?”
Looking for the low maintenance lifestyle with all the luxury and accessibility you could ask for? Look no further as this impressive Officer abode and looking for new owners!
Save yourself the hassle of building when you can move in with everything completed from the exposed aggregate driveway to the merbau decked entrance.
The home comprises of four generous sized bedrooms, master located to front of the home with double glazed windows, an oversized walk-in robe and luxurious ensuite with double shower.
The remaining three bedrooms are located to the rear of the home, all with built in robes and serviced by the main bathroom.
The stunning kitchen is the heart of the home with waterfall Caesar stone island bench and high quality stainless steel appliances such as 900mm oven and dishwasher.
Need space? The home boasts two separate living spaces for every member of the family to enjoy.
The home is set up perfectly for entertaining with a decked pergola with security shutters to keep out the weather allowing you to entertain all year round.
Other features of the home include internet points in nearly every room of the house, low maintenance yard, double garage, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum all located within walking distance to schools, shops, train station and parkland.
Call today to arrange a time to inspect.
